AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: OCM Custom Add Project Sponsorship Form
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: OCM Custom Add Project Sponsorship Form
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

c:Constraint.Name: CK_SPONSORSHIP_OPPORTUNITYUNIQUEFORCONSTITUENTACTIVESPONSORSHIPS
c:Constraint.c:CustomErrorMsg: This sponsor already has an active sponsorship to the selected opportunity.

c:Constraint.Name: CK_REVENUESCHEDULE_ENDDATEVALID
c:Constraint.c:CustomErrorMsg: The end date cannot be before the start date.

c:Constraint.Name: REVENUESCHEDULE.FREQUENCYCODE
c:Constraint.c:CustomErrorMsg: The frequency code is not valid for the selected schedule.

c:Constraint.Name: CK_REVENUESCHEDULE_NEXTTRANSACTIONDATEVALID
c:Constraint.c:CustomErrorMsg: The next transaction date has passed the end date. Please reschedule.

c:Constraint.Name: CK_SPONSORSHIP_SOLESPONSORSHIP
c:Constraint.c:CustomErrorMsg: The current opportunity already has sponsorships associated with it, so cannot be a sole sponsorship.

c:Constraint.Name: CK_SPONSORSHIP_STARTDATEAFTERPLANNEDENDDATE
c:Constraint.c:CustomErrorMsg: The expiration date must be greater than or equal to the start date.

c:Constraint.Name: UC_SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENT_LOOKUPID
c:Constraint.c:CustomErrorMsg: The automatically generated commitment lookup ID failed to be created because it conflicts with an existing ID. Please try to save again. If the error persists, please contact an administrator.

c:Exception.c:CustomErrorMsg: One or more designation amounts is invalid.
You must choose an opportunity to sponsor.
The selected sponsorship opportunity is no longer available. Please choose another sponsorship opportunity.
The selected sponsorship opportunity already has the maximum number of sponsors that are allowed by this program.
A designation could not be found for this sponsorship's opportunity.
A gift recipient must be chosen if the gift sponsorship checkbox is checked.
The 'Households can be donors' configuration setting is currently set to prohibit revenue from being applied to households.
The 'Group can be donor' setting for this type of constituent group is currently set to prohibit revenue from being applied to this group.
The 'Households can be donors' configuration setting is currently set to prohibit revenue from being applied to households.
The 'Group can be donor' setting for this type of constituent group is currently set to prohibit revenue from being applied to this group.
The selected child is too young for sponsorship.
The selected child is too old for sponsorship.

c:Item.c:Label: Find a matching opportunity of greatest need

c:UIAction.Description: Look up a source code to associate with this gift
Edit the currency and exchange rate information for this pledge
